QuestData.Title: Misery's Company
QuestData.Description:
<The husk of this poor soul has been stripped of everything, down to near nonexistence.
This suffering cannot continue. Save the others from their misery.>
QuestData.LogDescription: Kill $1oa Hopeless Vessels in Gorgoa: River of Souls.
QuestData.RewardText: <The hope of releasing these poor souls from their anguish washes over you.>
